title: PBE Tech Test Client
body: I've had the PBE Tech Test client installed on my computer, but it doesn't seem to be available for login anymore. Should I keep it on my computer for more testing or is this new line of Live Alpha testing going to completely replace that one?

replies.body:
The PBE League Client Alpha you have installed from the tech test you can keep, yes!

It will be updated and available for login when we bring the Alpha back to PBE, before the Alpha on live.

That being said, if you're accepted into the live Alpha, you'll have an separate League Client associated with your live install to play live games with.
